body:
Couldn't you have merged this into one of the two just-merged typo PRs. Rather than opening an pull-request to fix the same thing.

I can't believe new typos are being re-introduced this quickly anyways.

These typos were are all introduced in fairly recently merged PRs:

* `src/init.cpp`: minimimum (minimum) - typo introduced in 7b1add3c28aae8caf2e1517f15cd953eacbb4931 on December 13:th
* `src/rpc/client.cpp`: Specifiy (Specify) - typo introduced in 481f289765fab47ff2e0bd7dfb968f2bd92fd608 on November 12:th
* `src/rpc/misc.cpp`: callsites (call sites) - typo introduced in 99464bc38e9575ff47f8e33223b252dcea2055e3 on January 19:th
* `src/utiltime.h`: sytem (system) - typo introduced in 99464bc38e9575ff47f8e33223b252dcea2055e3 on January 19:th
* `src/validation.cpp`: assumedvalid (assumevalid) - typo introduced in e440ac7ef3b6f3ad1cd8fc7027cece40413202d9 on January 6:th
* `src/validation.cpp`: hashpower (hash power) - typo introduced in e440ac7ef3b6f3ad1cd8fc7027cece40413202d9 on January 6:th
* `src/validation.cpp`: inadvertantly (inadvertently) - typo introduced in 4afbde6028708541c4da8732a1bd12fb8735fdae on December 16:th
* `src/validation.cpp`: connnected (connected) - typo introduced in 4afbde6028708541c4da8732a1bd12fb8735fdae on December 16:th
* `src/validationinterface.h`: tranactions (transactions) - typo introduced in 094e4b33839404d9c18200fc30d9a993a3dc106f on December 16:th
* `src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp`: replacable (replaceable) - typo introduced in cc0243ad32cee1cc9faab317364b889beaf07647 on December 9:th
* `src/wallet/wallet.cpp`: carefuly (carefully) - typo introduced in 094e4b33839404d9c18200fc30d9a993a3dc106f on December 16:th

Please note that these are commit dates. Merge dates are likely a few weeks later on average.
